SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER
!VM Name : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "VM Name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_KVM_VM_NAME# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
!OS Type : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "OS Type" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_KVM_OS_TYPE# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
!Description : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Description" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_KVM_DESCRIPTION# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
!Memory : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Memory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_KVM_MEMORY# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
!CPUs : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "CPUs" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_KVM_CPUS# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
!Disk Path : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Disk Path" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_KVM_DISK_PATH# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
!Disk Size : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Disk Size" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_KVM_DISK_SIZE# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
!Image Location : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Image Location" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_KVM_IMAGE_LOCATION# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
!Configurations : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Configurations" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_KVM_CONFIGURATION# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
! Status messages : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** CREATE VM ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** CREATE VM ACTION FAILED ********"
: SET &UC4RB_KVM_CMD# = "virt-install"
!VM Name : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_KVM_VM_NAME# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_KVM.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_VM_NAME# = &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# : SET &UC4RB_KVM_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_KVM_CMD#, " --name &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
!OS Type :IF &UC4RB_KVM_OS_TYPE# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_KVM_OS_TYPE# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_KVM.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_KVM_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_KVM_CMD#, " --os-type &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") :ENDIF
!description :IF &UC4RB_KVM_DESCRIPTION# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_KVM_DESCRIPTION# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_KVM.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_KVM_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_KVM_CMD#, " --description &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") :ENDIF
!Memory : SET &UC4RB_KVM_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_KVM_CMD#, " --ram &UC4RB_KVM_MEMORY#")
!CPUs : SET &UC4RB_KVM_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_KVM_CMD#, " --vcpus &UC4RB_KVM_CPUS#")
: SET &UC4RB_KVM_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_KVM_CMD#, " --noautoconsole")
!Disk Path : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_KVM_DISK_PATH# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_KVM.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_KVM_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_KVM_CMD#, " --disk path=&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
!Disk Size : SET &UC4RB_KVM_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_KVM_CMD#, ",size=&UC4RB_KVM_DISK_SIZE#")
:set &IMAGE_REMOTE# = str_find(&UC4RB_KVM_IMAGE_LOCATION#, "://") :if &IMAGE_REMOTE# = 0 : set &IMAGE_OPTION# = "cdrom" :else : set &IMAGE_OPTION# = "location" :endif
!Image Location : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_KVM_IMAGE_LOCATION# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_KVM.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_KVM_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_KVM_CMD#, " --&IMAGE_OPTION# &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
!Configurations :IF &UC4RB_KVM_CONFIGURATION# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_KVM_CONFIGURATION# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_KVM.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_KVM_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_KVM_CMD#, " --extra-args &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
:PRINT "Command Executed :: &UC4RB_KVM_CMD#"
&UC4RB_KVM_CMD#
execcode=$? if [ "$execcode" -ne "0" ] then : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR exit $execcode fi
: SET &UC4RB_KVM_CMD# = "virsh domuuid"
: SET &UC4RB_KVM_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_KVM_CMD#, " &UC4RB_VM_NAME#")
output=`&UC4RB_KVM_CMD#` echo "UC4RB_KVM_VM_UUID::=$output"
: SET &UC4RB_KVM_CMD# = "virsh dominfo"
: SET &UC4RB_KVM_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_KVM_CMD#, " &UC4RB_VM_NAME#")
echo "Created VM info"
&UC4RB_KVM_CMD#
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_KVM.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI:
:SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE") :SET &UC4RB_KVM_VM_UUID# = ""
:IF &STATUS# EQ 0 : SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",, "REP","UC4RB_KVM_*","COL=DELIMITER", 'DELIMITER=*::=*') : PROCESS &HND# : SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2)
: IF &KEY# EQ "UC4RB_KVM_VM_UUID" : SET &UC4RB_KVM_VM_UUID# = "&VALUE#" : ENDIF
: ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# :ENDIF
:PUBLISH &UC4RB_KVM_VM_UUID#,,"WORKFLOW"
